acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleDoubleValuesWithThePodamDoubleValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.DoubleValuePojo

Then the Object DoubleRangeValuesPojo ( doubleFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 15.60953180293894 doubleFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 218.07434465007074 doubleFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 doubleObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 29.626096778115862 doubleObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 731.981895675291 doubleObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 ) should not be null
Then the double value (0} should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the double value 15.60953180293894 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the double value 218.07434465007074 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
Then the Object 10.1245 should not be null
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
